mapper.insert: insert into suitemember (login_id, password, name, tel, role, create_at, update_at) values (#{login_id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{tel}, #{role}, sysdate(), sysdate())
mapper.select: select count(*) from suitemember where login_id = #{login_id}
select * from suitemember where login_id = #{login_id} and password = #{password} and role in (#{role}, 'A');
